EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: EFT Decline Batch Pre Process Edit Data Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Edit form that launches the EFT Decline Batch Process
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_EFTDECLINEBATCH_PREPROCESS ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @BATCHNUMBER nvarchar(50), @BATCHTYPE tinyint ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle updating the data update dbo.USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS set BATCHNUMBER = @BATCHNUMBER, BATCHTYPE = @BATCHTYPE, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE where ID = @ID end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
